remarks: Value of division: the (unique) element ` x ` such that ` ( B x. x ) = A ` .  This is meaningful only when ` B ` is nonzero. (Contributed by NM, 8-May-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Feb-2014.)
statement:
divval $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ B =/= 0 ) -> ( A / B ) = ( iota_ x e. CC ( B x. x ) = A ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
